section.title: Using DITA to become "localization-ready"
section.p: Currently there are no plans to translate this document into languages other than US English. However, it would be well positioned to do so for the following key reasons:

ul.li: The document was written using DITA, an XML vocabulary that supports 9 output formats and over 40 languages
The core vocabulary set could provide a translation center with basic information about the Toolkit and related products.
Most of the "about" topics have been "conref'ed" from the core vocabulary, so that content needs to be translated only once.
